alert.note: Alert for Fauquier; Warren (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 1:10AM EDT until June 23 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of northern Virginia and northwest Virginia, including the following counties: in northern Virginia, Fauquier. In northwest Virginia, Warren. * WHEN...Until 300 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 108 AM EDT, Water levels remain elevated on small streams and continue to result in flooded roadways across the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Front Royal... Chester Gap... Riverside... Karo... Glen Echo... Riverton... Buckton... Arco... Browntown... Cedarville... Bentonville... Reliance... Nineveh... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
